title: PhatMage Thank you!
body: Thank you to PhatMage from support my window closed before i could thank you for your help! A+ 10/10 help!

replies.body: Thanks Phatmage! Got account hacked and he fixed it up in two days! Thanks!{{item:1051}}  Fist Bump!

Always happy to see players having a good time with support ^_^!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
